channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
hello i need some help :) [u][b] i have 317 source based on delta![/b][/u]
i want to change the place of death.
Example:
i died (in RS) and teleported to varrock how i can change it to edge? (after i died)
with thanks :)

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @lord_dharok lord dharok
item.description:
@lord_dharok wrote:

goto cleint ctrl + f and find actiontimer or deadtimer

mine looks like this
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
keepItem1();
keepItem2();
keepItem3();
deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
youdied();
PKz();
pEmote = 3103;
teleportToX = 3233;
teleportToY = 2902;
teleblock=false;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
if (keepItem != 0) {
addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
}

then edit the coords to your likeing

Read full topic

yep its in client.java
under

goodluck;)
